name: Natural Collagen Platinum
shortDescription: This formula is designed for intensive care of all skin types. However,it is especially recommended for the care of mature, dry and sensitive skin. Primarily dedicated for cosmetic care of face and cleavage. It can be used for treatments in beauty salons and at home. It is a semi-fluid gel with clear shades of white with minuscule air bubbles.
description:
Effects:

  • Improves skin tone, minimizing the visibility of wrinkles.
  • Stimulates the skin to produce its own collagen.
  • Improves the overall appearance of the skin.
  • Significantly improves hydration.
  • Creates a protective layer on the skin so that it does not lose moisture.
  • Reduces roughness of the skin and smooths it.
  • Gently exfoliates the skin thus accelerating its renewal.
  • Lightens discolorations and evens out skin. Is very well tolerated by the skin.
  • Contains no parabens and no preservatives.

Active Ingredients:

  • Natural collagen
  • Elastin
  • Glycol caprylic
  • Lactic acid

name: Natural Collagen Silver
shortDescription: Recommended for the intensive care of all skin types especially dry and sensitive skin. Designed for use in beauty salons,as well as at home. Ideal after sunbathing when the skin is dry and thirsty for nutrients. Recommended for any age to restore softness and elasticity to the skin.It is semi-liquid gel with shades of pearl gray with visible minuscule air bubbles. The form of gel facilitates application and distribution.
description:
Effects:

  • Stimulates the skin to produce its own collagen.
  • Improves the overall appearance of the skin and has a revitalizing effect.
  • Increases the ability of the skin to retain water.
  • Creates a protective layer on the skin so that it does not lose moisture.
  • Significantly improves hydration.
  • Increases skin tone.
  • Has a high absorption.
  • Is very well tolerated by the skin.
  • Contains no parabens and no preservatives.

Active Ingredients:

  • Natural collagen
  • Elastin
  • Glycol caprylic
  • Lactic acid

name: Natural Collagen Graphite
shortDescription: Recommended for hair and nails, and as an addition to bath water.It is used successfully in hairdressing and cosmetics salons.It is also used for skin care. It is a semi-fluid gel with pearly shades of graphite with visible minuscule air bubbles. The form of gel facilitates application and distribution. It is derived from the dorsal part of the fish with the most pigment, therefore its coloration and use for the whole body, except for the face. We recommend Collagen Silver (for the body), and for face care and delicate areas we recommend Collagen Platinum.
description:
Effects:

  • Stimulates the skin to produce its own collagen.
  • Improves overall appearance of skin, hair and nails.
  • Increases the water retention.
  • Creates a protective layer so that the skin and the hair do not lose moisture.
  • Significantly improves hydration.
  • Reduces roughness and makes the skin smooth and elastic.
  • Has a high absorption rate.
  • Is very well tolerated.
  • Contains no parabens and no preservatives.

Active Ingredients:

  • Natural collagen
  • Elastin
  • Glycol caprylic
  • Lactic acid
